smart device that uses custom computer vision and machine learning algorithms to provide early breast cancer detection.  The device captures images of a person with an Ultra HD infrared camera, measures spot temperature, and analyzes structured light using LiDAR for volume and shape recognition—powered with custom computer vision and machine learning algorithms that is trained on millions of registered breast cancer cases.\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]},{\"object\":\"inline\",\"type\":\"link\",\"data\":{\"url\":\"https://www.epam.com/about/newsroom/press-releases/2020/epam-wins-estee-lauder-hackathon-2020-awards\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"Pink application that provides a 24/7 support ecosystem for men and women going through chemotherapy or recovering from breast cancer. Using the app, patients foster, in real-time, genuine communication and can even meet in-person for events sponsored by the hospital to help combat loneliness. \",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"uui-richTextEditor-header-3\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"ELC Offices \\r\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"image\",\"data\":{\"size\":738082,\"src\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/5e0ce2b4-795f-4b70-bd4d-a8f8a04c757d/Offices.PNG?preview=true\",\"path\":\"https://onboarding.epam.com/app/cdn/5e0ce2b4-795f-4b70-bd4d-a8f8a04c757d/Offices.PNG?preview=true\",\"align\":\"align-center\",\"fileName\":\"Offices.PNG\",\"name\":\"Offices.PNG\",\"mimeType\":{\"type\":\"image\",\"subtype\":\"png\",\"parameters\":{},\"qualityValue\":1,\"concrete\":true,\"wildcardType\":false,\"wildcardSubtype\":false,\"charset\":null},\"type\":\"image\",\"id\":\"5e0ce2b4-795f-4b70-bd4d-a8f8a04c757d\",\"imageSize\":{\"width\":827,\"height\":567},\"extension\":\"PNG\"},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\",\"marks\":[]}]},{\"object\":\"block\",\"type\":\"paragraph\",\"data\":{},\"nodes\":[{\"object\":\"text\",\"text\":\"\\r\",\"marks\":[]}]}]}}"
